name: RolloftheDice
0:
”Alexa, open roll of the dice”
”Alexa, ask roll of the dice to roll the dice”
”Alexa, ask roll of the dice to roll a 20 sided die”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll of the dice
des: Need to roll a dice in a pinch? You can now do it from your Alexa devices! You can roll a 6 sided dice by default or you can specify the size of your dice
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
